void db2a(int debug2d[100][100],int n, int m)
{
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            cout << debug2d[i][j];
        cout << endl;
}
ll int dp[1004][1005];
int main()
{
    ll int t,sum,m,n,i,j,k;
    Sl(t);Sl(sum);
    t++;
    ll int ans = 0;
    while(t--){
        mem(dp,0);
        Sl(n);Sl(m);
        dp[0][0] = 1;
        for (i = 1; i <= n; i++){
            for (j = 1; j <= sum; j++){
                dp[i][j] = 0;
                if(j == 0){
                    dp[i][0] = 1;
                    continue;
                }
                for (k = 1; k <= m; k++){
                    if(j >= k)
                    dp[i][j] = (dp[i][j]+dp[i-1][j-k])%mod;
                }
            }
        }
        //Pl(dp[n][sum]);
        //ll int ans = 0;
        ans = (ans + dp[n][sum])%mod;
    }
    Pl(ans);
}
